meanings: Noun being sociable, being a people person

vlive.korean: 주변을... People around me... 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요
수빈이가 좋은 사람이라서 주변에 좋은 사람만 있을 것 같다고요? There must be good people around me because I'm a nice person? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈입니다!
vlive.english: There must be good people around me because I'm a nice person?

vlive.korean: 여기 주변에 뭐 있나? Is there one near here? 듣기 View video TWICE : Happy JEONGYEON Day
회사 주변에 광고 뭐 있나? Is there one near by? 듣기 View video TWICE : Happy JEONGYEON Day
뭐 주변에 마음에 드는 아저씨는 없고? No one around you? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 엄마가 연락도 없이 서울에 나타난 이유 [인서울] - EP.14

examples.korean: The new building does not harmonize with its surroundings. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 새 건물은 주변 환경과 어울리지 않는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The new building does not harmonize with its surroundings. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The mixture of sights, smells and sounds around her made her senses reel. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 주변에서 느껴지는 광경, 냄새, 소리들 때문에 감각이 혼란스러웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
